historia boa e atmosfera melhor ainda
This game is a Steam classic!

Impressive in just about every way. I normally don't like puzzle games very much, but while some levels were tricky I never felt so frustrated that I wasn't having fun. The movement and portal mechanics feel amazing. GLaDOS, Wheatley, and Cave Johnson are incredibly witty and memorable, due in no small part to the fantastic performances from their voice actors. There's a reason this game is still so popular ten years on. If you haven't played it yet, you owe it to yourself to try. If you wait for a Steam sale they practically give this game away for free.
Gracias Valve por crear semejante obra de arte, la humanidad entera se arrodilla ante esta preciosidad.
fun for first time players, and fun for people to speedrun (bhopping is great to learn, highly recommend)
